reviewText: [PAM] was a interactive video art installation, video database, as well as online community of video artists from 2005 to 2010. It was launched in 2005 and at the time was a response to YouTube as an alternative video art portal. This DVD volume is filled with impressive video art from all around the globe from it's time period. It's a great survey of video art of the time period and should be of interest to artists, techies, and collectors. Limited quantities were produced so this disk should have value in anyones video collection.
